attributes.comment:
The fee increase proposal for the USCIS is too drastic a measure to be taken.
Adoption is expensive enough already, and it is unconscionable to raise fees by
up to 66% for adoption-related petitions. For many of those choosing to adopt, the
financial struggle is already upon us. Don't raise these fees so that the end result
may be fewer childen adopted.

I feel that the only form of action I have is to voice my opinion, and therefore, I am
doing so. Please reconsider the proposal to increase fees for USCIS related
petitions.

Thank you.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Allison M. Oberg
